name: places/ChIJcyzNNFNYwokRAo9csZczqWM
formattedAddress: windows 24-28, 625 8th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: windows 24-28, 625 8th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: The worst service ever!! We were waiting for the bus for 4 hours and it never came. When we wanted our money back the lady on the counter wanted to call the police on us!! Never pick this company!!! NJ transit is way more better!!

text.text: The worst service ever!! We were waiting for the bus for 4 hours and it never came. When we wanted our money back the lady on the counter wanted to call the police on us!! Never pick this company!!! NJ transit is way more better!!

originalText.text: On 12/2/2021 @ 10:25 am I was driving my tractor trailer on I 87 in the Bronx.  I was in the right lane. In the middle lane close to me were  2 academy busses. The one in front moved into the right lane and simultaneously the 2nd bus # 1499 started turning  into the right lane from Directly on my left side. I had to jam on my brakes to avoid him from running into the side of my truck. This was an extremely dangerous and reckless lane change on that driver's part.

text.text: On 12/2/2021 @ 10:25 am I was driving my tractor trailer on I 87 in the Bronx.  I was in the right lane. In the middle lane close to me were  2 academy busses. The one in front moved into the right lane and simultaneously the 2nd bus # 1499 started turning  into the right lane from Directly on my left side. I had to jam on my brakes to avoid him from running into the side of my truck. This was an extremely dangerous and reckless lane change on that driver's part.

originalText.text: The bus basically drove me off the road crash driving!

text.text: The bus basically drove me off the road crash driving!

originalText.text: Lady in the counter need to learn how to be polite with the customers. And they need to be in the ticket counter all the time during working hours.  She wasn't in the counter  and when I called she was mad at me . This isn't the first time , last time there was another gentleman  and it happened  the same situation.  I don't know why they hate to stay in counter and in case if anyone called for service they are not friendly.  It wasn't like this before. May be too much work  for them.

I don't know why they hate to stay in counter and in case if anyone called for service they are not friendly.  It wasn't like this before. May be too much work  for them.

originalText.text: Horrible service in the end. They stranded a whole bus load of riders, myself included because they were late in keeping to their schedule and did not think it worth it to accommodate the riders whose bus was rerouted. We had to find our own transportation from Atlantic City. I personally addressed the issue to them and of course they never responded. I haven't boarded another academy bus since and don't plan to!!
